<?php
if(!CLEANED) {
$R=array();
foreach($_REQUEST as $k => $v) {
array_push($R[$k],addslashes($v));
}
$_REQUEST=$R;
define("CLEANED",true);
unset($R);
}
?>

<?php
if($_REQUEST[0] && !CLEANED) {
$R=array();
foreach($_REQUEST as $k => $v) {
array_push($R[$k],addslashes($v));
}
$_REQUEST=$R;
define("CLEANED",true);
unset($R);
}
?>
